recipes.name: Pizza Margherita
recipes.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
steps: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over the dough.
Add slices of mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with a pinch of salt before serving.
